typeDescriptions.typeString: function (string memory,string memory,contract IERC20[] memory,uint256,address,struct ILocallyPausable.PauseParams memory) view returns (struct ExtensibleWeightedPool2Tokens.NewPoolParams memory)

getCreationCode().details: Returns the creation code of the contract this factory creates.

getCreationCodeContracts().details: Returns the two addresses where the creation code of the contract crated by this factory is stored.

isPoolFromFactory(address).details: Returns true if `pool` was created by this factory.
